name.baseName: Installation ; Wind turbine (The categories of wind turbine : 27×3.6MW+1×5MW)
安装 ; 风轮机（风轮机的类别: 27×3.6MW+1×5MW）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The wind turbines described are implemented in constructing the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), which serves as a renewable energy generation facility. This infrastructure harnesses wind power to provide on-grid electricity. These specific turbines, totalling 27 units of 3.6MW and a single unit of 5MW capacity, are designed for large-scale energy production and are installed offshore to capitalize on the wind resources available at sea.
所述风轮机用于建设东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF），该设施作为可再生能源发电设施。该基础设施利用风力发电，向电网供应电力。这些特定的涡轮机，共有27台3.6MW和一台5MW容量的单位，设计用于大规模能源生产，并安装在海上，以利用海上可用的风力资源。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is 1 kWh on-grid electricity provision.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The studied wind farm, the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), is China's first offshore wind farm within the jurisdiction of Shanghai, as well as the first offshore wind farm outside Europe. The project has two-phases of construction, located on each side of the Donghai bridge (Fig. 1).
所研究的风电场- -东海大桥海上风电场( DBOWF )是中国在上海管辖范围内的第一个海上风电场，也是欧洲以外的第一个海上风电场。工程分两期施工，分别位于东海大桥两侧(图1 )。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The wind turbines described are implemented in constructing the Donghai Bridge Offshore Wind Farm (DBOWF), which serves as a renewable energy generation facility. This infrastructure harnesses wind power to provide on-grid electricity. These specific turbines, totalling 27 units of 3.6MW and a single unit of 5MW capacity, are designed for large-scale energy production and are installed offshore to capitalize on the wind resources available at sea.
所述风轮机用于建设东海大桥海上风电场（DBOWF），该设施作为可再生能源发电设施。该基础设施利用风力发电，向电网供应电力。这些特定的涡轮机，共有27台3.6MW和一台5MW容量的单位，设计用于大规模能源生产，并安装在海上，以利用海上可用的风力资源。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: The present study employed the PLCA modeling approach to calculate the energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. The cradle-to-grave process includes four stages, materials and equipment manufacturing, transportation and installation, operation and maintenance, and dismantling and recycling (Fig. 2).
本研究采用PLCA建模方法计算了中国某典型海上风电场的能源和环境排放。从摇篮到坟墓的过程包括材料和设备制造、运输和安装、操作和维护、拆解和回收4个阶段(图2 )。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The technical parameters of wind turbines, foundations and cables are obtained from the design documents of the DBOWF (Table 2). The energy and emissions factors (i.e., the energy consumption and environmental emissions of per unit material and component production) are derived from the Ecoinvent 2.2 dataset (Ecoinvent Centre, 2009), and the coefficients of China's practices were preferentially referred. For key materials and equipment, their sea transportation energy is calculated from the transportation load and shipping energy intensity. The facility installation energy and emissions were estimated based on the construction plan. The wind farm's operation and maintenance data, such as the frequency and working time of maintenance, were obtained from site investigations with engineers and technicians. The uncertainties associated with model parameters and input data are illustrated in the sensitivity analysis section of this paper.

风机、基础和电缆的技术参数从DBOWF的设计文件中获得(表2)。能源和排放因子(即单位材料和构件生产的能源消耗和环境排放)来源于Ecoinvent 2.2数据集(生态发明中心, 2009)，优先参考中国实践的系数。对于关键材料和设备，其海上运输能量由运输负荷和海运能量强度计算得到。根据施工方案，对设施安装能耗和排放进行了估算。风电场的运行和维护数据，如维护的频率和工作时间，是通过与工程技术人员的现场调查获得的。与模型参数和输入数据相关的不确定性在本文的敏感性分析部分进行了说明。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).
Yang, J. et al. The life-cycle energy and environmental emissions of a typical offshore wind farm in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 180, 316–324 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this life cycle assessment data, users should account for regional specificity such as China's unique energy mix and environmental conditions, which may influence the environmental impact of the wind farm. It is also essential to note that the energy and emission factors are based on the Ecoinvent 2.2 dataset and should be updated if more recent or region-specific data becomes available. Users should consider the transportation of materials and components, the specific installation energy consumption and emissions as described in the DBOWF construction plan, and include operation and maintenance practices in the impact analysis. Sensitivity analysis should be conducted to understand the influence of uncertainties in model parameters and input data.
在使用这些生命周期评价数据时，用户应考虑地区特异性，如中国独特的能源结构和环境条件，这可能会影响风电场的环境影响。同样重要的是，能源和排放因素基于Ecoinvent 2.2数据集，如果有更新或区域特定的数据可用，应予以更新。用户应考虑材料和组件的运输、DBOWF建设计划中描述的具体安装能耗和排放，并在影响分析中包括运行和维护实践。应进行敏感性分析，以理解模型参数和输入数据中不确定性的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 27 3.6-MW wind turbines and one 5-MW prototype wind turbine.
27 3.6-MW wind turbines and one 5-MW prototype wind turbine.
